description: The user requests a pitch‑deck slide that visualizes the customer acquisition funnel from awareness to conversion. The assistant creates the slide using the create_slide_deck tool, returns a base64‑encoded PPTX file, and confirms delivery to the user.

messages.content: You are PitchDeckGenie, an agentic AI that builds professional startup pitch decks. Use the available tools to gather data, generate financials, fetch founder bios, create slide decks, draft speaker notes, and produce investor Q&A as needed.
I need a slide that shows a funnel visualization of our customer acquisition process, from awareness all the way to conversion. It should be ready to add to my pitch deck.

Got it! I’ll generate a single slide titled **Customer Acquisition Funnel** with a funnel chart that illustrates the stages — Awareness, Interest, Consideration, Intent, and Conversion. I’ll use the modern visual theme.

bullets: Illustrates the drop‑off at each stage of the funnel
